title: Synchrotron X-Ray Nano-Analysis for Material Science: from 2D to 4D
content: The new Extremely Brilliant Source storage ring of the European Synchrotron Radiation Facility (ESRF-EBS) [1] offers unprecedented combination of high brilliance and coherent X-ray beam to explore condensed and living matter. The nano-analysis beamline ID16B at the ESRF built during the Phase I of the ESRF upgrade program [2] takes advantage of these new features which, combined with modern high-speed detectors allows reaching outstanding temporal and spatial resolution.
